C

Carte - Class in Modele
This class defines the different types of cards used in the game, and their possible actions.
Carte(int, boolean, Conditions, suits) - Constructor for class Modele.Carte
This is the constructor for the subclass SuitCards, it is used when creating a new SuitCard.
Carte(int, boolean, Conditions) - Constructor for class Modele.Carte
This is the constructor for the Joker, since it doesn't have a suit, it needs a constructor that doesn't take suits as a parameter.
choisirCompteur() - Method in class Modele.Partie
This method chooses the rules by which the score will be calculated
choisirJoueur(ArrayList<Joueur>) - Method in class Modele.Difficile
This method returns a random player from the list of players in the game.
choisirJoueur(ArrayList<Joueur>) - Method in class Modele.Facile
This method chooses a random player to take an offer from
choisirJoueur(ArrayList<Joueur>) - Method in class Modele.JoueurVirt
Choosing a player, following the strategy chosen
choisirJoueur() - Method in class Modele.Partie
This method choose the next player to get to play
choisirJoueur(ArrayList<Joueur>) - Method in interface Modele.Strategie
This method allows a strategy to chose a player based on a list of players
choisirVainqueur() - Method in class Modele.Partie
This method chooses the winner of the game
clearChanged() - Method in class Modele.Observable
Reset changes
commencer() - Method in class Modele.Partie
This method allows one to start a game, asks for a number of players, their names, if they're virtual or physical and if they're virtual, indicates the difficulty of the virtual player.
compterAce(ArrayList<Carte>) - Method in class Modele.CompteurDeScore1
This method determines whether an Ace is worth 1 or 5 points, depending on the number of cards of the same suit in the jest.
compterAce(ArrayList<Carte>) - Method in class Modele.CompteurDeScore2
 
CompterNbCoeur(ArrayList<Carte>) - Method in class Modele.CompteurDeScore1
This method counts the number of hearts in a player's jest.
CompterNbCoeur(ArrayList<Carte>) - Method in class Modele.CompteurDeScore2
 
compterScore(Visitor) - Method in class Modele.Partie
This method uses the counter to visit each player's jest and get their score
compterScoreCoeur(ArrayList<Carte>) - Method in class Modele.CompteurDeScore1
This method calculates the score Heart cards gives.
compterScoreCoeur(ArrayList<Carte>) - Method in class Modele.CompteurDeScore2
 
compterTrefleCarreauPique(ArrayList<Carte>) - Method in class Modele.CompteurDeScore1
This method contains all the elements to calculate the score of Spade, Club and Diamond suit cards.
compterTrefleCarreauPique(ArrayList<Carte>) - Method in class Modele.CompteurDeScore2
 
CompteurDeScore1 - Class in Modele
This class is a Visitor designed to calculate player's jest scores.
CompteurDeScore1() - Constructor for class Modele.CompteurDeScore1
The constructor of this class, initialise the score to 0 for each time it is called to calculate a jest's score.
CompteurDeScore2 - Class in Modele
This class implements the Visitor design pattern.
CompteurDeScore2() - Constructor for class Modele.CompteurDeScore2
 
Conditions - Class in Modele
This class represents the condition inscribed at the bottom of each card, for whenever it is a trophy card.
Conditions(action, suits) - Constructor for class Modele.Conditions
This is the constructor for conditions that need a suit in order to be met
Conditions(action, int) - Constructor for class Modele.Conditions
This is the constructor for conditions that need a face value in order to be met
Conditions(action) - Constructor for class Modele.Conditions
The constructor of conditions that stand on their own.
console - Variable in class Modele.Partie
This boolean checks if the player wants to use the GUI or the console
continu() - Method in class Modele.Partie
This method resumes and give the lock back to the next thread waiting, it sends out a notification to all Observers.
Controleur - package Controleur
 
Controleur - Class in Controleur
This class receives information from the Vue package and transmit it to the Modele package
Controleur(Partie, PanelJeu) - Constructor for class Controleur.Controleur
This constructor defines all the actions possible on the GUI, each click on a button has a different function and this class is the one who defines those.
creerEspaceDeJoueur(int, int) - Method in class Vue.PanelJeu
create a JPanel for players
creerPioche() - Method in class Modele.Partie
This method create cards and add them to the original deck of Partie, using Carte constructor and Conditions.
creerPiochePetit() - Method in class Modele.Partie
Create the smaller deck where cards not taken at the end of the round are sent to.
creerTableDeJeu() - Method in class Vue.PanelJeu
Create a TableDeJeu
